name: #MyDJNameIs
description:
A dj answers a web post of group looking for a new member to to join there hip hop band. The band quickly becomes popular over night and must do whatever it takes to get to the next level.  

If you are a fan and want to help development for future updates consider donating to help show your support. Every donation goes to funding development and help pay new artist.  

are you a producer or rapper that wants your music in a video game consider emailing  to djnamefanpage@gmail.com
